testcase.name: should show a summary of the vinyls

failure.message:
Too few invocations for:
1 * app.console.render { View view -> view.items == ["Collection Summary", new Summary(vinylCount:7, artistCount: 6, songCount:18, genreCount:4)] } (0 invocations)
Unmatched invocations (ordered by similarity):
1 * <Console>.render(View: [Collection Summary, Vinyls: 7 Artists: 7 Songs: 18 Genres: 4])
